protocol.name: P-GSE28800-2
protocol.text: Trizol (Invitrogen, Carlsbad, CA, USA) and further purified using RNeasy Plant RNA purification kit (QIAgen, Valencia, CA, USA)

protocol.name: P-GSE28800-3
protocol.text: UCSD GeneChip Microarray Core; Affymetrix GeneChip IVT Labeling Kit, according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual)

protocol.name: P-GSE28800-4
protocol.text: UCSD GeneChip Microarray Core; Affymetrix Eukaryotic Target Hybridization protocol (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual)

protocol.name: P-GSE28800-5
protocol.text: UCSD GeneChip Microarray Core; Affymetrix GeneChip Scanner 3000 with GCOS software according to manufactuer's protocol (GeneChip Expression Analysis Technical Manual)

protocol.name: P-GSE28800-6
protocol.text: Probe set summarization and normalization was performed by robust multi-array averaging (gcrma, including background subtraction, summarization by median polish and quantile normalization) using the R/Bioconductor package affy.
